Control Name: 2.3.1 Availability targets such as SLAs, SLIs and SLOs are defined for the application and key scenarios and monitored
Control Statement: Are availability targets such as Service Level Agreements (SLAs), Service Level Indicators (SLIs), and Service Level Objectives (SLOs) defined for the application and/or key scenarios?

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 2.3 Have you defined key scenarios for your workload and how they relate to operational targets and non-functional requirements?
control_attributes.Control: 2.3.1 Availability targets such as SLAs, SLIs and SLOs are defined for the application and key scenarios and monitored
control_attributes.Description: Are availability targets such as Service Level Agreements (SLAs), Service Level Indicators (SLIs), and Service Level Objectives (SLOs) defined for the application and/or key scenarios?
